ModMetaData.name: ED-Embrasures
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 0.17.0
Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18995
Adds embrasures for that can be shot through, while blocking passage.
There is an issue with raiders not targeting people behind Embrasures caused by optimisation in the vanilla targeting. I strongly advise that you look into the mod "I've Got You In My Sights" that is a fix for this issue and helps greatly to balance Embrasures. Thanks to DonationBox, spdskatr and Brrainz for working on this. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=30573.0
